也.definition: also; too; as well; (not ...) either; (used after a verbal or nominal expression X to indicate that X is an extreme or unexpected case) even (X); (literary) particle having functions similar to 啊[a5]

也好.definition: that's fine; may as well; (reduplicated) regardless of whether ... or ...

也好不了多少.pinyin: yě hǎo bù liǎo duō shǎo
也好不了多少.definition: hardly any better; just as bad

也好不到哪裡去.pinyin: yě hǎo bú dào nǎ lǐ qù
也好不到哪裡去.definition: just as bad; not much better

也就是說.definition: in other words; that is to say; so; thus

也有今天.definition: (coll.) to get one's just deserts; to serve sb right; to get one's share of (good or bad things); every dog has its day

也罷.definition: (reduplicated) whether... or...; never mind; fine (indicating acceptance or resignation)
